content: yes i have got more potholders and washcloths than any sane person could reasonably want but i think - as small knitting projects go - they are great to try out shaping ideas and techniques and the techniques that are used here are short row slipping stitches and weaving in yarn while knitting not ends other than that you only need to be able to do garter stitch these washcloths make great presents e g to accompany a spa set but you can also use the pieces as potholders or coasters a video tutorial in **arabic** has been provided by ma_yarns 1 instagram name it is available here 2 1 https //www instagram com/ma_yarns/ 2 https //youtu be/v1ikz0iuksk
